name: AEG
0:
”Alexa, turn on the air conditioner”
”Alexa, decrease the oven temperature by 20 degrees”
”Alexa, stop my dryer”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Hands-free voice control of your connected AEG appliances.
Ask Alexa to start, stop or change a setting and it’s taken care of. Need to know if your wash is ready or your dryer is on? Simply ask what the status of your appliance is.

You can also set the cooking function. Just ask Alexa to set the mode of the oven. Check the AEG app to see which oven functions are supported.
You can use the name of the appliance, shown in your AEG or Alexa app, to say what you want to control.

This skill does not support all controls, or appliances, in the AEG app. If you have any questions or comments, please contact AEG customer support.
To get started, go to the Alexa app and enable the AEG skill or simply ask, "Alexa, enable AEG".

Supported devices:
Air conditioner
Air purifier
Robot vacuum
Dehumidifier
Oven
Fridge
Dryer
Washing machine
Washer-dryer
Dishwasher
Cooktop
Hood

Contact us: voice@electrolux.com
